import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class ToddlerList extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props, "ToddlerList") const toddler = this.props.toddlerDetail const handleDelete = (toddler) => { if(toddler.id === this.props.toddlerDetail.id) { this.props.delete(toddler) } } return (

Name Birthday Emergency Contact Phone Allergy
{toddler.name} {toddler.birthday} {toddler.contact} {toddler.phone} {toddler.allergy}
) } }
